attributes.action: Ban alcohol in the United Kingdom. And punish the sale, use and possession.
attributes.additional_details:
There are many reasons why alcohol should be banned in the UK down below I have listed you some of those reasons with legit sources.

In fact alcohol is more dangerous than crack and other drugs:
http://www.theguardian.com/society/2010/nov/01/alcohol-more-harmful-than-heroin-crack

It causes all sorts of physical and psychological diseases:
http://www.nhs.uk/Conditions/Alcohol-misuse/Pages/Introduction.aspx

If alcohol was invented today it would be illegal anyway due it's dangerous causes.
attributes.background: It causes all sorts of problems for your body. After you drink you become more and more depend on it. It causes tons of cancer, and cancer related symptoms. Millions of people died because of alcohol, families were destroyed and people totally destroyed their life because of this dangerous drug.
